channel.title: Table on GC is Online

item.title: Merge two table
item.description: The question is how to merge two tables, it is easy to use merge. However, it is not easy to merge because the two table have different sample sizes and we want to keep all of them. Table 1: Some names not in table 2 name plot1 name_a 1 name_t 2 name_g 3 name_e 4 name_b 5 name_l 6 name_p 7 name_u 8 name_k 9 name_m 10 name_h 11 name_z 12 name_o 13 name_f 14 name_v 15 Table 1: Some names not in table 1 name plot2 name_x 1 name_q 2 name_f 3 name_y 4 name_j 5 name_g 6 name_o 7 name_l 8 name_h 9 name_r 10 Now we have problems, some names exist in table 1 but not in table 2, and vice verse.
